EmailTemplate.name: Customer Completed Quiz - Pass
EmailTemplate.subject: You Passed the Quiz for {!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Class__c} class!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations! You have successfully completed and passed the {!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Class__c} class quiz with a score of {!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Test_Score_New__c}.
Note, the following classes are recommended for all Salespeople:
Sales Consultant Level 1
Sales Consultant Level 2
Sales Consultant Level 3
If you need further assistance or have any questions Please feel free to reach out to our Virtual Training Team.
Virtual Training Team virtualtaining@vinsolutions.com
O: 800-980-7488
F: 913-825-6396
